body.p:
Hon C. P. Morton &
Hon Wm Dennison
Governoers of Indiana and Ohio
Gentlemen
Col Thos L. Crittenden is hereby fully authorized to represent me in the conference to be held at 4 oclock tomorrow evening at Spencer House in Cincinnati

Gov. Magoffin to Gov Dennison
Apr. 29. 1861
1861
